## HttpFSOptions.urlResolver property

Optional URL pre-processor. If provided, every incoming VFS path is first passed through this resolver to produce the final URL or path string.

Use cases: - Rewriting logical VFS paths to CDN URLs - Injecting cache-busting query params - Mapping to object/data URLs

**Signature:**

```typescript
urlResolver?: (url: string) => string;
```
